name: Sorry. (Entschuldigung) ~ A Psychological Horror Visual Novel
description: Entschuldigung (which means ‘sorry’ in German) is a bleak horror story, told by a lost young man who longs to find a place in which he can feel safe. Set in pre-war Berlin, the story is driven by an insatiable curiosity that leads our protagonist down a very dark path into the murky depths of his soul.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
